title: Social Information Technology Awareness Campaign 2017 by ACSES, WCE Sangli
name: Social Information Technology Awareness Campaign 2017
body:
• My Team (from left to right): Me (in red), Samir Khurd, Vaibhav Thombare, Prafull Desai (then acting ACSES president), Shubham Kharose, Priyadarshani Patil.
  • Team introduction and agenda discussion with the students.
  • I am surrounded by curious students who are clearing off their doubts with me.
